#Funciones
```{r, cache=TRUE, echo=TRUE}
find_sample <- function(x){
  for_index <- sample(1:nrow(x), size=10, replace = FALSE)
  new_df <- x[for_index,]
  return(new_df)
}

data <- data.frame(
  a = 1:10,
  b = sample(c("GT", "US", "CA"), size = 10, replace = TRUE)
)
find_sample(data)
```
